about_the_game:
Once you have downloaded this content, you can set a new master by going to Hidden Leaf Village in the online lobby followed by the Ninjutsu Library.

A special training pack for your avatar!

As you train with Naruto Uzumaki (Baryon Mode), you will acquire Training Points which can be used to unlock a wide variety of Ninjutsu and costumes for your avatar!

Content includes:
• 3 Ninjutsu
- Baryon Bullet Barrage (Attack Type)
- Baryon Tail Breaker (Attack Type)
- Baryon Breakthrough (Substitution Jutsu)

• 1 Secret Technique
- Baryon Mode (Attack Type)

• 2 Costumes
- Naruto Outfit 3
- Naruto Outfit 4

• 2 Avatar Parts
- Hair: Naruto (Sexy Jutsu)
- Hair: Naruto's Knitted Hat

• Additional Content
- Honorary Title: Duty Over Flesh

A special training pack for your avatar!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8350K
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.30GHz / AMD FX-6300 Six-Core
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X / R7 265 2 GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
